item.title: No Incentive
item.description: The best incentive is no incentive https://twitter.com/kanzure/status/1230997662339436544 Introduction This is the last session of the conference. Time flies when you’re having fun. We’re going to be starting with David Schwartz who is one of the co-creators of Ripple and he is going to be talking about a controversial topic that “the best incentive is no incentive”. I am David Schwartz as you just heard I am one of the co-creators of Ripple.
